Chinese-Character-pattern
Aug 31, 2014

I found this useful php code snippet on the internet.
And post here for future use and remind. 

1 <?php
2 function checkChineseCharater($str){
3 	if (preg_match("/^[\x{4e00}-\x{9fa5}]+$/u",$str)) {
4 		return true;
5 	} else {
6 		return false;
7 	}
8 }
9 ?>
